name: NETXP LINUX Virtualization - VirtualBox usage
description: Monitors the execution of VirtualBox (virtualbox), providing visibility into virtualization-related activities on the system. Detection of VirtualBox activities helps in monitoring virtualization operations and potential security risks.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "virtualbox" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
